title: Looking for a T206 Tinker Bat "On" Polar Bear
author: PEEK enterprises

posts.post_title: Looking for a T206 Tinker Bat "On" Polar Bear
posts.post_content:
Seeking a PSA/SGC "3" or above.  Will pay strongly or I have around (100) T206 with tougher backs to choose from in trade.  

Also seeking many other T206 with non-standard backs.

Email only please - [url]ppgustafson@yahoo.com[/url]
